Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20564013] HD50=27.4±1.2 μM against Human red blood cells .
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: It displays a typical tightly folded cyclic Scystine knot structure. A range of pH and temperature titrations reveal that a conserved glutamic acid in loop 1 Sof the structure forms a key hydrogen bond network, similar to that reported previously for other cyclotides.
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism.
Sequence Information.PTM: Kalata-B5 is a cyclic peptide which contains three disulfide bonds 4-20; 8-22; 13-27.

Literature.Title: Plant cyclotides A unique family of cyclic and knotted proteins that defines the cyclic cystine knot structural motif.
Literature.Author: Craik DJ, Daly NL, Bond T, Waine C.

Literature.Title: The cyclotide fingerprint in oldenlandia affinis elucidation of chemically modified, linear and novel macrocyclic peptides.
Literature.Author: Plan MR, Göransson U, Clark RJ, Daly NL, Colgrave ML, Craik DJ.

Literature.Title: Structural and biochemical characteristics of the cyclotide kalata B5 from Oldenlandia affinis.
Literature.Author: Plan MR, Rosengren KJ, Sando L, Daly NL, Craik DJ.
